metadata.title: CVE-2021-23956 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An ambiguous file picker design could have confused users who intended toselect and upload a single file into uploading a whole directory. This wasaddressed by adding a new prompt. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 85.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23956` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 85.0+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '85.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
